Class LadderAndSnake

java.lang.Object
LadderAndSnake
public class LadderAndSnake
extends java.lang.Object
class LadderAndSnake contains the methods that run core engine of the game
Author:
siddharthasingh

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int[][] board
    stores the board layout in a 2D array
    private int[] ladder
    array stores ladder end position at cell address ladder start
    private int[] order
    array stores order of play
    private int[] position
    array stores position of players on the board
    private int[] snake
    array stores position of snake tails at cell address snake head

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    LadderAndSnake()
    default constructor to initialize class variables with default values
    LadderAndSnake​(int no)
    parameterized constructor that takes number of player as a parameter initializes board pattern in board array snake positions in snake array position size corresponding to no of players order size corresponding to no of players

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int[] checkTie​(int[] roll_values)
    method checks for tie and returns an array method variable tie_data- integer array with no of tie at 0 index and tied players at following indexes
    int flipDice()
    method returns a random integer between 1 and 6 inclusive
    private int[] orDer​(int no)
    method returns integer array with order in which players will roll dependent on descending values on first die roll integer array a, b, c and d used in tie-breaking operations integer array player_order stores the final order and is returned
    void play()
    method that contains core engine of the gameplay method variables- integer accumulators to store player numbers integer dp to prompt for board display
    void print​(int no)
    method to print the board grid with snake, ladder and player positions cnt, pos method variables used for print operation
    int[] roLl​(int[] no)
    method to returns an array with roll values corresponding to the length of parameter array method variabel roll_values- integer array to store the roll values

      method returns a random integer between 1 and 6 inclusive

    • orDer

      private int[] orDer​(int no)
      method returns integer array with order in which players will roll dependent on descending values on first die roll integer array a, b, c and d used in tie-breaking operations integer array player_order stores the final order and is returned
      Parameters:
      no - - Number of players playing the game
      Returns:
      decided player order

    • roLl

      public int[] roLl​(int[] no)
      method to returns an array with roll values corresponding to the length of parameter array method variabel roll_values- integer array to store the roll values
      Parameters:
      no - - array of size equal to the no of rolls required
      Returns:
      roll values for no of player in parameter

    • checkTie

      public int[] checkTie​(int[] roll_values)
      method checks for tie and returns an array method variable tie_data- integer array with no of tie at 0 index and tied players at following indexes
      Parameters:
      array - with rolled values for all player
      Returns:
      tie data containing no of ties and players tied

    • play

      public void play() throws java.io.IOException
      method that contains core engine of the gameplay method variables- integer accumulators to store player numbers integer dp to prompt for board display
      Throws:
      input - output exceptions during player interupt
      java.io.IOException
